section.p: CCD represents the ASTM CCR <Purpose> object as a relationship between two classes -- the source represents the act of creating a summary document, the target is the reason for creating the document, and the relationship type is "RSON" (has reason). The target act may be an Observation, Procedure, or some other kind of act, and it may represent an order, an event, etc.

ol.li: CONF-25: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "23745001" Documentation procedure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT STATIC 20080731)
CONF-23, CONF-24: SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus STATIC V3NE08)

CONF-26: SHALL satisfy: Contains exactly one entryRelationship / @typeCode, with a value of 'RSON' 'Has reason' 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 ActRelationshipType STATIC, to indicate the reason or purpose for creating the CCD.
CONF-27: SHALL satisfy: The target of entryRelationship SHALL be an Act, Encounter, Observation, Procedure, SubstanceAdministration, or Supply.
[CCD] CONF-25: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "23745001" Documentation procedure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT STATIC 20080731)
[CCD] CONF-23, CONF-24: SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus STATIC V3NE08)

[CCD] CONF-26: SHALL satisfy: Contains exactly one entryRelationship / @typeCode, with a value of 'RSON' 'Has reason' 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 ActRelationshipType STATIC, to indicate the reason or purpose for creating the CCD.
[CCD] CONF-27: SHALL satisfy: The target of entryRelationship SHALL be an Act, Encounter, Observation, Procedure, SubstanceAdministration, or Supply.
